channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These Chrome extensions spoof Workday, NetSuite, and others to trick victims - here's what to look for
item.description: Five extensions were found targeting enterprises and multinational organizations, taking over valuable accounts.

item.title: Here are the 55 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2025
item.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

item.title: Test des Motorola Buds Loop : le sport avant tout, le son après
item.description: Motorola débarque sur le segment des écouteurs ouverts à clip avec les Buds Loop, un modèle clairement pensé pour les sportifs. À 130 euros, le fabricant joue la carte de l'accessibilité. Mais qu'en est-il vraiment côté performances sonores, souvent moyennes avec ce type d'écouteurs ? On a vérifié.

item.title: Your Fellow coffee maker has a secret video game hidden in its interface – here's how to play it
item.description: Fellow makes serious coffee equipment, but its designers have still found room for a little fun.

item.title: You can now edit password-protected Microsoft Office files directly within Google Workspace
item.description: Google Workspace makes it even easier to view and edit password-protected Office files on the web.

item.title: Want proper audiophile-grade music from your iPhone? This tiny hi-res 3.5mm adapter does it for less than the price of a phone case
item.description: Questyle's ultra-affordable dongle means better sound from your smartphone, tablet or laptop

item.title: Musk claims Tesla will restart work on its Dojo supercomputer
item.description: Elon Musk posted on X that Tesla will be restarting work on Dojo3, the third generation of its in-house supercomputer project. The Dojo team had been disbanded last year as the company prioritized the AI chips that run on board Tesla vehicles. Musk said the company is returning to the project "now that the AI5 chip design is in good shape." The purpose of the Dojo project is to process video recordings and other data from Tesla vehicles and use that to train the "neural net" behind the company's Full Self-Driving software. Last year, however, Musk posted on X that "It doesn’t make sense for Te...

item.title: Oculus founder calls Meta Quest layoffs ‘Not a disaster’ — but I still can’t see it as anything but terrible
item.description: 'Not a Disaster'? Here's why Oculus founder Palmer Luckey is wrong about the Meta Quest layoffs.

item.title: This Roku Plus Series is "a great budget 4K QLED TV" and it just dropped to record-low price of $449.99 on Amazon
item.description: The 65-inch Roku Plus Series just hit its lowest price ever at Amazon, and it's one we recommend if you want the best budget QLED TV on the market.

item.title: Who are the most spoofed brands in phishing scams? Let's be honest, you can probably guess most of them - but there are a few surprises
item.description: Microsoft is still the most impersonated brand when it comes to phishing attacks – Google, Amazon, Apple and Meta are also in the top five.

item.title: I’m equal parts hopeful and terrified of a potential Assassin’s Creed Black Flag remake — here’s what I need Ubisoft to change, and what should be left alone entirely
item.description: As Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake rumors gather speed, I'm looking at the things I want to see Ubisoft change in a potential remake. Also, some aspects that I want left out of it entirely.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : quelles sont les offres à saisir en ce lundi 19 janvier ?
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver suivent leur chemin et nous arrivons déjà presque à la troisième démarque ! Au programme : toujours plus d'offres Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique. Même le gaming s'invite de plus en plus dans la danse des promotions. ...

item.title: "Many, many customers have asked for this. And I think they're going to love it." Apple could stand to learn a thing or two from its own products, because I still miss the best iPhone I've ever owned from 2016 – and it's all down to one key design feature
item.description: Removing the 3.5mm headphone jack is Apple's greatest design crime, and 10 years on I'm still feeling the aftershocks.

item.title: I saw 2 next-gen 3D TVs without glasses that use a new tech that changes everything — here’s how it works
item.description: 3D movies without all the downsides? Finally, I might watch Avatar at home

item.title: This $101 Booster Box is the fastest way to start a Magic game
item.description: As of Jan. 19, the Magic: The Gathering Foundations Jumpstart 2025 Booster Box is on sale for $101.56, down from $131.76, at Amazon.

item.title: ‘I can’t stand what it writes’: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon share their views on using AI to write movies, but admit it could become a new editing tool
item.description: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon are not sold on AI writing movies, but that doesn't mean they don't think it won't become a common editing tool like CGI.

item.title: The Nvidia RTX 5090 has vanished from retailer shelves in US – and GPUs from third-party sellers cost nearly as much as a whole PC
item.description: GPUs from third-party sellers in the US cost almost as much as a full PC that packs Nvidia's flagship graphics card.

item.title: How Often Is Too Often for New ‘Star Wars’ Movies?
item.description: With Lucasfilm now under new leadership, let's break down one of the franchise's biggest problems.

item.title: Netflix will reportedly add live-action Universal movies to its back catalog sooner than it said it would — including the new Jurassic Park film
item.description: Netflix could become the new streaming home for more Universal movies from January onwards, according to a new report.

item.title: Matt Damon Says What We Already Know About Netflix and Our Liquefied Brains
item.description: Damon and Affleck are nostalgic old geezers now, but that doesn't mean they're wrong.

item.title: Le nouveau « TGV M », le train nouvelle génération, arrive bientôt dans nos gares
item.description: À compter de juillet prochain, il sera possible de monter dans le tout nouveau TGV fabriqué par Alstom qui reliera Paris à Marseille.

item.title: La box internet de RED by SFR va t-elle encore augmenter son prix ? Un compte à rebours prend fin ce soir à minuit
item.description: C'est peut-être votre dernière chance de passer à la RED Box de RED by SFR à son prix de 20,99 euros par mois... avant une éventuelle augmentation. En effet, un mystérieux compte à rebours est apparu sur la page du forfait internet. Réponse ce soir, à minuit.

item.title: Amazon fait le plein de bonnes affaires durant les soldes : le TOP 16 des offres
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver battent encore leur plein chez Amazon, et tout le monde peut en profiter — même sans être membre Prime ! Alors que la 3ᵉ démarque approche, le géant américain propose encore une large sélection de remises à ne pas manquer. C’est le moment idéal pour faire de bonnes affaires avant la prochaine vague de réductions.

item.title: Bungie’s Marathon shooter launches on March 5th
item.description: Bungie is putting an official date on Marathon today, its delayed extraction shooter. The slick-looking shooter from the makers of Halo and Destiny was originally set to release in September, but will now launch on March 5th. Bungie will launch Marathon on Xbox Series S / X, PS5, and PC, priced at $39.99. Bungie initially […]

item.title: Le mystérieux appareil d’OpenAI pourrait être présenté d’ici la fin de l’année
item.description: OpenAI ne devrait pas tarder à présenter son premier appareil mystère basé sur l'IA. Un dirigeant de la start-up a officiellement fait miroiter une annonce d'ici la fin 2026.

item.title: Meilleures liseuses électroniques : quel modèle choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Quelle est la meilleure liseuse, noir et blanc ou couleur, à acheter ? Entre les Kindle d'Amazon et les Kobo, mais aussi d'autres marques telles que Boox, voici nos recommandations des meilleures liseuses.

item.title: Hackers could exploit these W-Fi security flaws to knock your internet offline
item.description: A bug could force you to have to manually restart your router, but a patch is available.

item.title: 'We're entering...a post-truth era, where it's almost impossible to tell if something's real or not"; Cameo CEO on the uncharted territory of AI
item.description: In this exclusive conversation with Cameo CEO and co-founder Steven Galanis, we look at the impact of AI on his business and our perception of authenticity.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs mini PC à acheter en 2026 ? Notre sélection
item.description: Vous voulez un ordinateur de bureau compact, efficace et pas trop cher ? Le mini PC, petit et livré clé en main, est fait pour vous. Voici les meilleurs modèles de minis PC que l'on vous recommande.
